about us

Who are we?

We are a group of professional lawyers, economists, and developers, here to help you start your business from scratch. Our team thoroughly examines all the details of your future business and plans appropriate actions to move forward

Acalista group provides you with support in all areas of your business from A to Z to make sure everything runs smoothly.

All you need to do is to sit back and relax while your business starts running. We’ve helped hundreds of clients to get their businesses up and running

where are we

Locations

Our headquarters are in Israel
with branches in

  • UK
  • Latvia
  • Estonia
  • Ukraine

Our Specialties

Marketing
We develop ads and promote your business on appropriate online and offline channels.
Web Development
Website development of any difficulty level.
Branding
As an essential part of your business, we start by developing your brand. We set the tone, the voice, the style of your design, and everything else that’s related to your brand.
Administrative and Legal Services
Everything – from registration of your business to bank selection and tax planning.
Cryptocurrencies
Crypto exchange portal for businesses that want to use this tool and offer more opportunities to their customers.
Real Estate
From renal to purchase of commercial estates to serve as offices, warehouses, and other commercial purposes.
